Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui.guicontrollers

Class InGameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui.guicontrollers.AbstractController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui.guicontrollers.InGameController
public class InGameController
extends AbstractController
Controller for the InGame state

  • Method Details

    • getImageView

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView getImageView​(javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      This method, when given an Image instance, returns an ImageView with the correct dimensions, which are bound to the size of the board
      Parameters:
      image - the Image instance whose ImageView is to be resized accordingly to the board's size
      Returns:
      the resulting ImageView

    • getImageStack

      private java.util.List<javafx.scene.image.ImageView> getImageStack​(ReducedCell cell)
      This method returns the correct rendering for a cell, including blocks, domes and workers
      Parameters:
      cell - the cell to be rendered
      Returns:
      a list of ImageView in the order in which they should be rendered, from the bottom up

    • onSceneShow

      public void onSceneShow()

      public void setupController()
